price: 30. Mpe tango basi okati ya mboka balobi ete: Mwasi ya mokonzi alingaki kokweisa elenge mobali naye ye moko! Ya sólo penza, asili kolangwa ye bolingo, ya sólo biso tomoni été asili kobunga nzela penza.
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ نِسۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ تُرَٰوِدُ فَتَىٰهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۖ قَدۡ شَغَفَهَا حُبًّاۖ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰهَا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqāla nis'watun fī al-madīnati im'ra-atu al-ʿazīzi turāwidu fatāhā ʿan nafsihi qad shaghafahā ḥubban innā lanarāhā fī ḍalālin mubīnin
